animals.name: Donald
animals.description: A duck is a small type of swimming bird with a short neck and legs. They have webbed feet to help them swim and broad and flat bills, which they use to feed. They can live in freshwater or seawater and their feathers are waterproof! Male and female ducks often have very different appearances.

animals.name: Pascal
animals.description: Lizards are scaly-skinned reptiles that are usually distinguished from snakes by the possession of legs, movable eyelids, and external ear openings. However, some traditional (that is, non-snake) lizards lack one or more of these features.

animals.name: Buggs & Lola
animals.description: Rabbits(bunnnies) are small, furry mammals with long ears, short fluffy tails, and strong, large hind legs. They have 2 pairs of sharp incisors (front teeth), one pair on top and one pair on the bottom. They also have 2 peg teeth behind the top incisors.

animals.name: Jason Vorhees
animals.description: A dog is a domestic mammal of the family Canidae and the order Carnivora. Its scientific name is Canis lupus familiaris. Dogs are a subspecies of the gray wolf, and they are also related to foxes and jackals. Dogs are one of the two most ubiquitous and most popular domestic animals in the world.

animals.name: Fred Kruger
animals.description: A cat is a furry animal that has a long tail and sharp claws. Cats are often kept as pets. countable noun. Cats are lions, tigers, and other wild animals in the same family. The lion is perhaps the most famous member of the cat family.

animals.name: Thumper
animals.description: Rabbits are small, furry mammals with long ears, short fluffy tails, and strong, large hind legs.
